channel.title: Run Coinomi multi crypto wallet anonymously
channel.description:
Hi everybody, I've successfully installed Coinomi wallet (www_coinomi_com) in Whonix workstation. My goal is to do anonymous crypto currency operations.
Will all Coinomi traffic be automatically routed throught Tor or I need to do some hacks?
I know that 'use Electrum' could be the easy answer but I prefer Coinomi because it's multicurrency.
Nice weekend

item.title: Run Coinomi multi crypto wallet anonymously
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I guess chances are good but I didn’t test this app specifically.

Read full topic
item.source: Run Coinomi multi crypto wallet anonymously

item.title: Run Coinomi multi crypto wallet anonymously
item.dc:creator: annusdomini
item.description:
Thank you for your quick reply Patrick. So Coinomi traffic will go through Tor out of the box?

Read full topic
item.source: Run Coinomi multi crypto wallet anonymously

item.title: Run Coinomi multi crypto wallet anonymously
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Welcome to Whonix forums and thank you for your question!

Nothing special about Coinomi. Just like any other application.

whonix.org – 9 Mar 20

Documentation - Whonix

Whonix ™ Documentation. A Crash Course in Anonymity and Security on the Internet.

Read full topic
